variables.name: meta
variables.rawdescription:
Button Component

A reusable button component following atomic design principles.
This is an "atom" - a basic building block of the design system.

## Features
- Multiple variants (primary, secondary, outline, text, danger)
- Three sizes (sm, md, lg)
- Disabled state
- Type safety with TypeScript
- Uses design tokens for consistent styling
variables.description:
Button Component

A reusable button component following atomic design principles. This is an "atom" - a basic building block of the design system.

Features

  • Multiple variants (primary, secondary, outline, text, danger)
  • Three sizes (sm, md, lg)
  • Disabled state
  • Type safety with TypeScript
  • Uses design tokens for consistent styling

src/components/atoms/button/button.stori.description:
Button Component

A reusable button component following atomic design principles. This is an "atom" - a basic building block of the design system.

Features

  • Multiple variants (primary, secondary, outline, text, danger)
  • Three sizes (sm, md, lg)
  • Disabled state
  • Type safety with TypeScript
  • Uses design tokens for consistent styling
